core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Cyberpunk with Swiss Grid.
Emotion First: Evoke excitement, competition, and future-tech awe.
Content is King: Every section tells the story of the fest.
Zoom in: Bold focus on details (prizes, dates).
Negative Space: Generous padding to let the neon glow breathe.
Contrast: High contrast (Neon on Black) for maximum impact.
anti_patterns: No flat, boring backgrounds (Use Noise + Gradients).
No center-aligned text blocks unless for specific dramatic effect.

assets.icons: Lucide React (default) or Phosphor Icons for specific needs

custom_components.name: NeonButton
custom_components.description: Button with glow effect and hover lift.
custom_components.styles: bg-primary text-white px-8 py-3 rounded-full hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(124,58,237,0.6)] transition-all duration-300

custom_components.name: GlitchText
custom_components.description: Text component with CSS glitch animation for headers.
custom_components.styles: relative inline-block text-transparent bg-clip-text bg-gradient-to-r from-secondary to-accent animate-pulse

custom_components.name: BentoCard
custom_components.styles: bg-surface/50 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/10 rounded-xl p-6 hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors

hero.background: Parallax particles or video loop with overlay.

about.layout: Split view: Text left, Image/Graphic right.

clubs.interaction: Hover reveals details. Click opens Full-screen Modal.

events.card_style: Glassmorphism cards with hover zoom effect.

universal_guidelines: Ensure all text has sufficient contrast against the dark background.
Do not use generic gradients; use noise-textured backgrounds.
Mobile-first: Ensure all grids collapse to 1 column on mobile.
